name: codone
description: A Webflow Hybrid App for integrating custom code and data handling capabilities

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd data-client && npm install && npm run dev" "cd designer-extension && npm install && npm run dev"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd data-client && npm install && npm run build" "cd designer-extension && npm install && npm run build"

author: Julian Galluzzo
